targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_date_string,
    created_at::date AS created_date,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS confirmed_success_rate,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / COUNT(*)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS overall_success_rate,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS failure_rate
FROM 
    payment_intent
WHERE 
    merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND created_at >= $__timeFrom()
   AND created_at < CURRENT_DATE::TIMESTAMP
GROUP BY 
created_date_string,
    created_date

SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('week', created_at), 'YYYY-"W"IW') AS week_label,
    DATE_TRUNC('week', created_at) AS created_week,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS confirmed_success_rate,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / COUNT(*)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS overall_success_rate,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS failure_rate
FROM 
    payment_intent
WHERE 
    merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND created_at >= $__timeFrom()
    AND created_at < CURRENT_DATE::TIMESTAMP
GROUP BY 
    week_label,
    created_week
ORDER BY 
    created_week;

SELECT 
    TO_CHAR(created_at, 'Month YYYY') AS month_label,
    DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at) AS created_month,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS confirmed_success_rate,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / COUNT(*)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS overall_success_rate,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 
        (SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal / SUM(CASE WHEN status != 'requires_payment_method' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) * 100 
    ELSE 
        0 
    END AS failure_rate
FROM 
    payment_intent
WHERE 
    merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND created_at >= $__timeFrom()
   AND created_at < CURRENT_DATE::TIMESTAMP
GROUP BY 
month_label, created_month
ORDER BY created_month

SELECT
    pa.merchant_id AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) AS total_payments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) AS successful_payments,
    CASE
        WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) = 0 THEN 0.0  -- Handle division by zero
        ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id)
    END AS payment_success_rate
FROM
    payment_attempt AS pa
LEFT JOIN
    payment_intent AS pi
ON
    pa.payment_id = pi.payment_id
WHERE
    pi.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND (pa.payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR pa.payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
    AND pa.connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
    AND pa.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
    AND pa.created_at <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    pa.merchant_id
ORDER BY
    total_payments DESC;

SELECT
    pa.connector AS connector_id,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) AS total_payments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) AS successful_payments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) AS payment_success_rate
FROM
    payment_attempt AS pa
LEFT JOIN
    payment_intent AS pi
ON
    pa.payment_id = pi.payment_id
WHERE
    pi.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND (pa.payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR pa.payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
    AND pa.connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
    AND pi.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
    AND pi.created_at <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    pa.connector
ORDER BY
    total_payments DESC;

SELECT
    pa.payment_method_type AS payment_method_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) AS total_payments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) AS successful_payments,
    CASE
        WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) = 0 THEN 0.0  -- Handle division by zero
        ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id)
    END AS payment_success_rate
FROM
    payment_attempt AS pa
LEFT JOIN
    payment_intent AS pi
ON
    pa.payment_id = pi.payment_id
WHERE
    pi.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND (pa.payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR pa.payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
    AND pa.connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
    AND pa.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
    AND pa.created_at <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    pa.payment_method_type
ORDER BY
    total_payments DESC;

SELECT
    pa.merchant_id AS merchant_id,
    pa.connector AS connector_id,
    pa.payment_method_type AS payment_method_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) AS total_payments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) AS successful_payments,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pi.status = 'succeeded' THEN pi.id END) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT pi.id) AS payment_success_rate
FROM
    payment_attempt AS pa
LEFT JOIN
    payment_intent AS pi
ON
    pa.payment_id = pi.payment_id
WHERE
    pi.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
    AND (pa.payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR pa.payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
    AND pa.connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
    AND pi.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
    AND pi.created_at <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
    pa.merchant_id,
    pa.connector,
    pa.payment_method_type
ORDER BY
    total_payments DESC;

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture')
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})

  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom()

  AND payment_intent.status in ('succeeded', 'requires_capture')
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status = 'failed'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method' AND payment_intent.status != 'failed' AND payment_intent.status != 'succeeded' AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_capture'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
  AND payment_intent.attempt_count > 1

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status = 'succeeded'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
  AND payment_intent.attempt_count > 1

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method'
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
  AND payment_intent.attempt_count > 1

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status = 'failed'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
  AND payment_intent.attempt_count > 1

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (
    payment_intent.status = 'requires_payment_method'
    OR (payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method' AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote}) AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote})))
  )

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status  = 'succeeded'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})

SELECT COUNT(1) from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.status  = 'requires_payment_method'
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})

SELECT connector as "Connector", error_code as "Error code", error_reason as "Error reason", COUNT(1) AS "Txns" from payment_attempt
  WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND status = 'failure'
  AND merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
  AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))
  GROUP BY connector, status, error_code, error_reason
  ORDER BY "Txns" DESC

panels.title: Top Error codes and messages for Merchant <> Connector

targets.rawSql:
SELECT payment_intent.merchant_id as "Merchant ID", payment_attempt.connector as "Connector", payment_attempt.payment_method_type as "Payment Method Type", payment_attempt.payment_method as "Payment Method", payment_intent.status as "Status", COUNT(1) AS "Txns" from payment_intent
  INNER JOIN payment_attempt ON payment_intent.active_attempt_id = payment_attempt.attempt_id
  WHERE payment_intent.created_at >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND payment_intent.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
  AND payment_intent.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
  AND payment_intent.status NOT IN ('succeeded', 'failed', 'requires_payment_method', 'cancelled', 'requires_capture')
   AND (
    payment_intent.status = 'requires_payment_method'
    OR (payment_intent.status != 'requires_payment_method' AND connector IN (${connector:singlequote}) AND (payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote})))
  )
  GROUP BY payment_intent.merchant_id, payment_intent.status, payment_attempt.connector, payment_attempt.payment_method, payment_attempt.payment_method_type

panels.title: Non Terminal Payment Details excluding Dropouts

targets.rawSql:
SELECT payment_intent.merchant_id,payment_attempt.payment_id,payment_attempt.connector,payment_intent.status as intent_status,payment_attempt.status as attempt_status,payment_intent.created_at, payment_attempt.payment_method,payment_attempt.payment_method_type
FROM payment_attempt

INNER JOIN payment_intent
ON payment_attempt.payment_id=payment_intent.payment_id

and payment_attempt.merchant_id NOT LIKE ('hyperswitch%') 
and payment_attempt.created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND payment_attempt.created_at <= $__timeTo() 
and payment_attempt.status IN ('pending')
and payment_attempt.connector NOT IN ('trustpay')
AND payment_attempt.merchant_id IN (${merchant_id:singlequote})
AND payment_attempt.connector IN (${connector:singlequote})
AND (payment_attempt.payment_method_type IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}) OR payment_attempt.payment_method IN (${payment_method_type:singlequote}))

GROUP BY payment_intent.merchant_id,payment_intent.status,payment_attempt.status,payment_attempt.payment_id,payment_attempt.connector,payment_intent.created_at,payment_attempt.payment_method,payment_attempt.payment_method_type
ORDER BY payment_attempt.status,payment_intent.created_at DESC

list.definition: select connector from payment_attempt where connector != ''
list.label: connector
list.name: connector
list.query: select connector from payment_attempt where connector != ''

list.definition:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN payment_method_type IS NULL 
             OR payment_method_type = 'credit' 
             OR payment_method_type = 'debit' 
        THEN 'card'
        ELSE payment_method_type
    END AS payment_method_type
FROM payment_attempt;
list.label: Payment Method Type
list.name: payment_method_type
list.query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN payment_method_type IS NULL 
             OR payment_method_type = 'credit' 
             OR payment_method_type = 'debit' 
        THEN 'card'
        ELSE payment_method_type
    END AS payment_method_type
FROM payment_attempt;
